Source code for xtreme1.exceptions

[docs]class SDKException(Exception):
    code = None

    def __init__(self, message='', code=None):
        if code:
            self.code = code
        super().__init__(f'<{self.code}> {message}')




[docs]class UrlNotFoundException(SDKException):
    code = 404




[docs]class ParamException(SDKException):
    code = 'PARAM_ERROR'




[docs]class DatasetIdException(SDKException):
    code = 'DATASET_NOT_FOUND'




[docs]class DataIdException(SDKException):
    code = 'DATA_NOT_FOUND'




[docs]class NameDuplicatedException(SDKException):
    code = 'NAME_DUPLICATED'




[docs]class DataUnlockedException(SDKException):
    code = 'DATASET__DATA__DATA_HAS_BEEN_UNLOCKED'




[docs]class ConverterException(SDKException):
    code = 'NOT_SUPPORT'




[docs]class SourceException(SDKException):
    code = 'UNPARSEABLE'




[docs]class NoPermissionException(SDKException):
    code = 'NO_PERMISSION'




[docs]class NodeIdException(SDKException):
    code = 'NODE_NOT_FOUND'



EXCEPTIONS = {
    ParamException.code: ParamException,
    DatasetIdException.code: DatasetIdException,
    DataIdException.code: DataIdException,
    NameDuplicatedException.code: NameDuplicatedException,
    ConverterException.code: ConverterException,
    DataUnlockedException.code: DataUnlockedException
}
